short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Grab color codes from webpages. (rgb, hex), & color history

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to easily select and store hex and rgb color codes. This extension also comes with a dark mode option for easy viewing.
